test_block_invalid_put.title: ------------------[Block Placement Test: Invalid-Sized File]------------------
test_block_invalid_put.description: This test validates that a tapestry.Block object will not accept a put() request for a file that is larger than the remaining size of the block.
test_block_invalid_put.pass message: [PASS] The Block object indicated it rejected the file.

test_verify_invalid_block.title: ------------------[Block Signature Validation Test]------------------
test_verify_invalid_block.description: This test validates that tapestry will reject a file with invalid signatures
test_verify_invalid_block.pass message: [PASS] The verify_blocks correctly ignored the invalidly-signed file.

test_recovery_index_invalid.title: ------------------[Recovery Index Confusion Test]------------------
test_recovery_index_invalid.description: Makes sure that RecoveryIndexError is raised correctly when loading a tapestry.RecoveryIndex option with data.

test_decompress_uncompressed.title: ------------------[Task_Decompress Test: Uncompressed Target]------------------
test_decompress_uncompressed.description: This test validates that the expected response is returned by TaskDecompress when it is called against a target file that does not contain BZ2 compressed data.
